issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
After updating Appcelerator Studio to the latest version I have this problem: right after I compile an app for iOS, and the app runs correctly, the IDE will freeze for a few seconds and it'll work again.

Console log:

[TRACE] :  updating tiapp metadata with Appcelerator Platform...

[freezes 10 seconds]

[TRACE] :  Uploaded tiapp metadata with Appcelerator Platform!

Appcelerator studio logs are empty during this.
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio freezes while "updating tiapp metadata with Appcelerator Platform..."

comments.body:
Hello,
Thanks for sharing this. Which XCode version you are using? Please share your full environmental details.
any updates on this? this is definitely slowing us down
Hello, Can you share a video demonstration of the issue that you are having? Thanks.

Here's the [video file|https://wetransfer.com/downloads/92dd29724d28941097a517b0377f353b20181024165237/fb08f0f4d8eb5d939d41af777acb721020181024165237/9d1450]

Unfortunately no screencast software let me show you the mouse loading cursor, but it takes almost 1 minute to upload the tiapp metadata (and in the mean time Appcelerator Studio is frozen).

Hello, The freeze issue in iOS 12 was reported multiple time. We sugggest using SDK 7.4.1.GA with iOS 12. There been some major updates regarding iOS 12 issue in this relaase. Let us know after test. Thanks.

the freeze here is happening on Appcelerator Studio, nothing to do with iOS (this happens with iOS 9 as well). Why does it take so long to update the metadata?

I updated to 7.4.1 and while my app seems not to crash too often, Studio always hangs for a while.
btw, this doesn't happen on Atom (life saver). I even deleted everything and reinstalled everything.
